about_the_game:
The Omega are an ancient race of pilgrims, marked by an enigmatic destiny: to complete a ritual forgotten by time. Burdened with a metallic sphere that weighs on both their souls and bodies, they must ascend a tower filled with indescribable dangers. Every step is a challenge, every jump a test of willpower. Only those who overcome the obstacles will earn the favor of the gods and be elevated to the stars, becoming celestial beings. But the path is uncertain, and glory belongs only to the bravest. Do you have the willpower to complete the ritual?

Challenges:

The tower they must ascend is filled with relentless obstacles and jumps that require absolute precision. Each level tests the limits of skill and patience, forcing the pilgrims to adapt and learn from their failures.

The Sphere:

For the Omega, the sphere they carry is not just a physical object, but a sacred symbol of their bond with the gods. It represents the weight of their destiny and the sacrifice required to attain transcendence. If they drop it, they must recover it or they cannot continue. The sphere is their only guide in the tower, a constant presence that must be protected at all costs. Every jump, every maneuver, is marked by the need to keep it intact, as it is the key to completing the ritual.

Features:

  • Difficult and Precise Jumps: Confront complex jumps that will test your skill and reflexes at every moment.

  • Dynamic Platforms: Overcome constantly moving platforms and adjust your strategy in real-time to advance without losing balance.

  • Challenging Obstacles: Each level is filled with obstacles that demand your utmost concentration.

  • Surreal Environments: Explore psychedelic landscapes and strange worlds that defy the laws of physics, where nothing is as it seems.

  • Learn from Mistakes: Every fall is an opportunity to improve. The game rewards perseverance and constant learning from your failures.

  • Maintain the Balance of the Sphere: The sphere is your greatest burden. Every move must be calculated to avoid dropping it, as losing it means going back.

  • Develop Patience: The key to progressing is patience. Each level challenges you to never give up and to find the best way to overcome each obstacle with calm and precision.

name: Omega

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: A difficult precision platformer set in a surreal world. Overcome challenging environments with extreme jumps and overwhelming obstacles as you face a constant challenge on your way to the summit. Are you ready for the challenge?
